verses.verse: Now these<WH428> are the generations<WH8435> of the sons<WH1121> of Noah,<WH5146> Shem,<WH8035> Ham,<WH2526> and Japheth:<WH3315> and unto them were sons<WH1121> born<WH3205> after<WH310> the flood.<WH3999>
The sons<WH1121> of Japheth;<WH3315> Gomer,<WH1586> and Magog,<WH4031> and Madai,<WH4074> and Javan,<WH3120> and Tubal,<WH8422> and Meshech,<WH4902> and Tiras.<WH8494>
And the sons<WH1121> of Gomer;<WH1586> Ashkenaz,<WH813> and Riphath,<WH7384> and Togarmah.<WH8425>
And the sons<WH1121> of Javan;<WH3120> Elishah,<WH473> and Tarshish,<WH8659> Kittim,<WH3794> and Dodanim.<WH1721>

By these<WH4480> <WH428> were the isles<WH339> of the Gentiles<WH1471> divided<WH6504> in their lands;<WH776> every one<WH376> after his tongue,<WH3956> after their families,<WH4940> in their nations.<WH1471>
And the sons<WH1121> of Ham;<WH2526> Cush,<WH3568> and Mizraim,<WH4714> and Phut,<WH6316> and Canaan.<WH3667>

And the sons<WH1121> of Cush;<WH3568> Seba,<WH5434> and Havilah,<WH2341> and Sabtah,<WH5454> and Raamah,<WH7484> and Sabtecha:<WH5455> and the sons<WH1121> of Raamah;<WH7484> Sheba,<WH7614> and Dedan.<WH1719>
And Cush<WH3568> begot<WH3205> <WH853> Nimrod:<WH5248> he<WH1931> began<WH2490> to be<WH1961> a mighty one<WH1368> in the earth.<WH776>

He <WH1931> was<WH1961> a mighty<WH1368> hunter<WH6718> before<WH6440> the LORD:<WH3068> wherefore<WH5921> <WH3651> it is said,<WH559> Even as Nimrod<WH5248> the mighty<WH1368> hunter<WH6718> before<WH6440> the LORD.<WH3068>
And the beginning<WH7225> of his kingdom<WH4467> was<WH1961> Babel,<WH894> and Erech,<WH751> and Accad,<WH390> and Calneh,<WH3641> in the land<WH776> of Shinar.<WH8152>
Out of<WH4480> that<WH1931> land<WH776> went forth<WH3318> Asshur,<WH804> and built<WH1129> <WH853> Nineveh,<WH5210> and the city<WH5892> Rehoboth,<WH7344> and Calah,<WH3625>
And Resen<WH7449> between<WH996> Nineveh<WH5210> and Calah:<WH3625> the same<WH1931> is a great<WH1419> city.<WH5892>
And Mizraim<WH4714> begot<WH3205> <WH853> Ludim,<WH3866> and Anamim,<WH6047> and Lehabim,<WH3853> and Naphtuhim,<WH5320>
And Pathrusim,<WH6625> and Casluhim,<WH3695> (out of whom<WH4480> <WH8033> <WH834> came<WH3318> Philistim,)<WH6430> and Caphtorim.<WH3732>
And Canaan<WH3667> begot<WH3205> <WH853> Sidon<WH6721> his firstborn,<WH1060> and Heth,<WH2845>
And the Jebusite,<WH2983> and the Amorite,<WH567> and the Girgasite,<WH1622>
And the Hivite,<WH2340> and the Arkite,<WH6208> and the Sinite,<WH5513>
And the Arvadite,<WH721> and the Zemarite,<WH6786> and the Hamathite:<WH2577> and afterward<WH310> were the families<WH4940> of the Canaanites<WH3669> spread abroad.<WH6327>

And the border<WH1366> of the Canaanites<WH3669> was<WH1961> from Sidon,<WH4480> <WH6721> as thou comest<WH935> to Gerar,<WH1642> unto<WH5704> Gaza;<WH5804> as thou goest,<WH935> unto Sodom,<WH5467> and Gomorrah,<WH6017> and Admah,<WH126> and Zeboim,<WH6636> even unto<WH5704> Lasha.<WH3962>
These <WH428> are the sons<WH1121> of Ham,<WH2526> after their families,<WH4940> after their tongues,<WH3956> in their countries,<WH776> and in their nations.<WH1471>

Unto Shem<WH8035> also the father<WH1> of all<WH3605> the children<WH1121> of Eber,<WH5677> the brother<WH251> of Japheth<WH3315> the elder,<WH1419> even<WH1571> to him<WH1931> were children born.<WH3205>
The children<WH1121> of Shem;<WH8035> Elam,<WH5867> and Asshur,<WH804> and Arphaxad,<WH775> and Lud,<WH3865> and Aram.<WH758>
And the children<WH1121> of Aram;<WH758> Uz,<WH5780> and Hul,<WH2343> and Gether,<WH1666> and Mash.<WH4851>
And Arphaxad<WH775> begot<WH3205> <WH853> Salah;<WH7974> and Salah<WH7974> begot<WH3205> <WH853> Eber.<WH5677>

And unto Eber<WH5677> were born<WH3205> two<WH8147> sons:<WH1121> the name<WH8034> of one<WH259> was Peleg;<WH6389> for<WH3588> in his days<WH3117> was the earth<WH776> divided;<WH6385> and his brother's<WH251> name<WH8034> was Joktan.<WH3355>
And Joktan<WH3355> begot<WH3205> <WH853> Almodad,<WH486> and Sheleph,<WH8026> and Hazarmaveth,<WH2700> and Jerah,<WH3392>
And Hadoram,<WH1913> and Uzal,<WH187> and Diklah,<WH1853>
And Obal,<WH5745> and Abimael,<WH39> and Sheba,<WH7614>
And Ophir,<WH211> and Havilah,<WH2341> and Jobab:<WH3103> all<WH3605> these<WH428> were the sons<WH1121> of Joktan.<WH3355>
And their dwelling<WH4186> was<WH1961> from Mesha,<WH4480> <WH4852> as thou goest<WH935> unto Sephar<WH5611> a mount<WH2022> of the east.<WH6924>
These <WH428> are the sons<WH1121> of Shem,<WH8035> after their families,<WH4940> after their tongues,<WH3956> in their lands,<WH776> after their nations.<WH1471>

These <WH428> are the families<WH4940> of the sons<WH1121> of Noah,<WH5146> after their generations,<WH8435> in their nations:<WH1471> and by these<WH4480> <WH428> were the nations<WH1471> divided<WH6504> in the earth<WH776> after<WH310> the flood.<WH3999>
